sen.j: 昭登親王（あきなりしんのう、長徳4年（998年） - 長元8年4月14日 (旧暦)（1035年5月23日））は、平安時代の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Akinari (998-May 23rd, 1035) was a member of the Imperial family in the Heian period.

sen.j: 花山天皇の第二皇子で母は若狭国国司平祐忠の娘・平平子。
sen.e: He was born to Emperor Kazan and TAIRA no Hirako, a daughter of Taira no Suketada, the Governor of Wakasa Province as the second prince.
He was born the second prince of Emperor Kazan and TAIRA no Hirako, a daughter of Taira no Suketada, the governor of Wakasa Province.

sen.e: His father had already become a priest when he was born, while his mother Hirako was a lowborn person.

sen.j: 更に父・花山法皇が平子の実母（つまり昭登の祖母）と通じて清仁親王を儲けるなど余りにも複雑な事情があったために、清仁親王ともども祖父冷泉上皇の子として育てられた。
sen.e: With such complicated circumstances as his father Emperor Kazan had Imperial Prince Kiyohito with Hirako's real mother (namely, grandmother of Prince Akinari), he and Prince Kiyohito were reared as children of the retired Emperor Reizei, their grandfather.

sen.j: このため世間では清仁親王を「親腹御子」、昭登親王を「女腹御子」と呼んで話題にしたという。
sen.e: Therefore, the two Imperial princes became the talk of people, who called Imperial Prince Kiyohito as "Oyabara no Miko (Imperial Prince borne by grandmother) and Imperial Prince Akinari as "Musume bara no Miko (Imperial Prince borne by mother).

sen.j: 寛弘元年5月4日 (旧暦)（1004年）には清仁親王とともに親王宣下を受ける。
sen.e: He was given the title of Imperial Prince in 1004 along with Imperial Prince Kiyohito.

sen.j: 当時政権の座にあった左大臣藤原道長は、複雑な背景を有する昭登らへの宣下に消極的であったものの花山法皇の意向を受けてやむなく従ったという。
sen.e: It is said that FUJIWARA no Michinaga, Sadaijin (minister of the left), who gained supremacy in the administration, reluctantly followed the Emperor Kazan's wish to give the title to both of them, although he took a negative stance considering their complicated backgrounds.

sen.j: 寛弘8年8月23日 (旧暦)（1011年）、藤原実資の加冠によって元服して、同年9月10日 (旧暦)に三条天皇の即位に合わせて四品親王となる。
sen.e: In 1011, he celebrated his coming of age by appointing FUJIWARA no Sanesue as the kakan no yaku (role to place a crown on the head of boy when he becomes adult) and became the Shihon Imperial Prince (fourth ranked Imperial Prince) in line with Emperor Sanjo's enthronement.
